name: Gas
descr: Gas services cover everything from installing  gas ovens to  repairing gas boilers, connecting gas lines and preparing gas supplies.

services.name: Emergency boiler repair
services.descr: Professional will come to  your house and try their hardest to fix your boiler as soon as possible.
services.subject: Boiler, gas lines and pipes, gas valve, etc.
services.works: Gas boiler repair or replacement (including ordering parts and installation).
services.exclusions: Service person may not be able to  repair the boiler if there are no parts available in stock.

services.name: Non-emergency boiler repair or installation
services.descr: Full gas central heating installations, replacements or repair, connecting boiler to the heating system, setting up optimal pressure, testing heating piping.
services.subject: Boilers, radiators, heating pipes, valves, gas pipes, etc.
services.works: Central heating installations, replacements or repair, heating system cleansing and power flushing, setting up optimal gas and water pressure, and further system testing.
services.exclusions: This is a non-emergency service, response time is 24hrs+.

name: Cleaning
descr: Residential cleaning services for all parts of your home. With tasks covering dishwashing, cleaning bathrooms, waste removal, furniture cleaning, window cleaning, deep cleans, disinfecting, laundry and ironing, and other general cleaning tasks in the home.

services.name: Complete home cleaning
services.descr: Cleaning and disinfecting surfaces and floors, dusting, vacuuming, mopping including cupboards, skirting boards , mirrors, pictures and ornaments, cleaning and tidying every room in your home including bathrooms
services.subject: Covers every room in the house including bathrooms, kitchens, cupboards, box rooms, vestibule, bay windows, lounges bedrooms, skirting boards, doors, carpets and floors.
services.works: Covers every room in the house including bathrooms, kitchens, cupboards, box rooms, vestibule, bay windows, lounges bedrooms, skirting boards, doors, carpets and floors.
services.exclusions: Windows, external areas and surfaces, laundry and ironing, fireplaces and chimney sweeping, dish washing, unsafe areas, electronic equipment, deep carpet cleaning, animal waste removal [pre-existing stains, furniture cleaning (except vacuuming), waxing, mould and limescale removals, tops of wardrobes Cleaners will not use ladders or lift heavy objects, only areas reachable from the floor can be cleaned

services.name: Bathroom and toilet cleaning
services.descr: Toilet, bath, sink, shower or bath cleaning and disinfecting. Includingtiles and floor, drains, taps, windows and mirrors, mould and limescale removals, etc.
services.subject: Toilets, bathrooms, baths, showers. sinks, mirrors, internal windows and glass, flooring and tiles.
services.works: Cleaning, dusting, disinfecting, and toilet bleaching.
services.exclusions: Cleaning significant stains, mould and limescale removals, external sides of windows, bathroom furniture, lights and electronics, and animal waste. Cleaners will not use ladders or lift heavy objects, only areas safely reachable from the floor will be cleaned.

services.name: Kitchen cleaning
services.descr: Cleaning kitchen surfaces floors and worktops, dishwashing,, fridges, freezers, hobs, ovens, dishwasher (internals), and inside cupboards.
services.subject: Kitchen and all kitchen surfaces, worktops, fridges, hobs.
services.works: Cleaning and disinfecting surfaces and floors, dish washing, freezer and fridge defrosting, emptying bins, etc.
services.exclusions: Cleaning significant stains, mould and limescale removals, external sides of windows, lights and electronics, cast iron pan deep cleaning, internal appliance cleaning (ovens), and animal waste. Cleaners will not use ladders or lift heavy objects, only areas safely reachable from the floor will be cleaned.

services.name: Bedroom or living room cleaning
services.descr: Mopping, vacuuming, and dusting including mirrors and internal-sides of windows, wall art, and ornaments.
services.subject: Bedrooms and living rooms only. Including making beds, cleaning the internal-sides of windows,  cupboards, mirrors, pictures and ornaments, floors, chairs, carpets, fireplaces, skirting boards, windowsills, carpets, wardrobes (inside and out), and any wood surfaces.
services.works: General cleaning, disinfecting high-touch surfaces, dusting, vacuuming, mopping, making beds, internal-sdes to windows, waxing etc.
services.exclusions: Laundry and ironing, cleaning any lights and electronics which cannot be turned off, , deep carpet cleaning, removing significant stains,, furniture cleaning (except vacuuming).Cleaners will not use ladders or lift heavy objects, only areas safely reachable from the floor will be cleaned.

services.name: Windows cleaning
services.descr: Residential windows cleaning, both internal and external-facing sides
services.subject: Windows cleaning: including conservatories, glass doors and mirrors
services.works: Cleaning, polishing and disinfecting all windows including conservatories, glass doors and mirrors
services.exclusions: Cleaners will only handle areas safe to reach with their equipment

services.name: Deep upholstery and carpet cleaning
services.descr: Furniture upholstery cleaning (leather or fabric) and carpet cleaning, including deep cleaning, stain and odour removal, and disinfecting and anti-bacterial treatments.
services.subject: Carpet and furniture cleaning service, including sofas, chairs, beds, bed heads, stools, curtains, rugs, and other leather and fabric furniture
services.works: Cleaning, vacuuming, dusting, stain and odour removal, disinfecting, and deep cleaning of all leather and fabric carpets and furniture
services.exclusions: Cleaners will only handle areas safe to reach and can only commit to helping with normal, removable stains.

services.name: Clothes laundry and ironing
services.descr: Family laundry and ironing, steaming and dry cleaning for clothes and bedsheets
services.subject: Clothes cleaning (laundry and ironing) including ironing, steaming, pressing and dry cleaning for any underwear, trousers, pants, shirts, t-shirts, bed sheets, and pillows
services.works: Laundry, ironing, steaming, pressing and dry cleaning
services.exclusions: Cleaners will only handle clothing that is able to be washed in a machine and can only commit to helping with normal, removable stains.” Please agree on who provides ironing equipment. This needs to be specified in either notes or in the service conditions

name: Pets
descr: Animal care services including dog walking, training and day care, cat sitting, trips to the vet, pet grooming and feeding.

services.name: Pet sitting
services.descr: Visiting your house and looking after your pet whilst you are away
services.subject: Your cat, dog, bird, or other pets
services.works: Coming to your house and looking after your pet. Including feeding, cuddling, brushing and socializing with your cat, dog, bird or other pet. Also includes feeding and changing the water for your pets, taking them to the vet in an emergency, administering any medicines. your pet requires, and changing the cat litter tray
services.exclusions: The service price does not include any veterinary treatments, the customer will have to pay vet charges directly. Unless specified in the service conditions the food needs to be provided by the owner. No aggressive, dangerous or illegal pets.

services.name: Dog walking
services.descr: Dog walking services to help your dog exercise and stay healthy while you are away.
services.subject: Dog
services.works: Morning or evening dog walking, collection from and returning to the owner's residence. While walking, dogs are restrained by a collar around their neck or harness. In case of emergency, the carer will take the dog to the vet.
services.exclusions: The service does not include any food, veterinary treatments, and the customer will have to pay vet charges directly. No agressive, dangerous or illegal pets.

services.name: Cat grooming
services.descr: Get your cat washed, groomed, and looking like a star
services.subject: Cat
services.works: Brushing out of dead hair, trim and grooming of all dead hair, cutting off hair knots, de-matting, cleaning of the fur, ears and eyes cleaning, cutting nails, general bathing, drying and styling.
services.exclusions: This service does not include applying any veterinary shampoos or treatments, all pets must have healthy hair and skin. No aggressive, dangerous or illegal pets

services.name: Doggy day care
services.descr: Whole-day dog care: pick up at residence, morning walk, playing throughout the day, feeding, evening walk, and return to residence.
services.subject: Dog
services.works: Service includes morning pickup and walk, day feeding, playing and petting throughout the day, evening walk, returning dog back to owner.
services.exclusions: The service does not include any veterinary treatments, vet charges have to be paid directly.No aggressive, dangerous or illegal pets.

services.name: Dog grooming
services.descr: Get your dog washed, groomed, and looking like a star
services.subject: Dog
services.works: Brushing out of dead hair, trim and grooming of all dead hair, cutting off hair knots, de-matting, cleaning of the fur, ears and eyes cleaning, cutting nails, general bathing, drying and styling.
services.exclusions: This service does not include applying any veterinary shampoos or treatments, all pets must have healthy hair and skin. No aggressive, dangerous or illegal pets.

name: Plumbing
descr: Plumbing services. Anything from blocked toilets and water pipe repairs, to installing a boiler.

services.name: Emergency plumbing
services.descr: Water leaks and burst pipes, blocked toilets, sinks, pipes and drains, low water pressure, tap radiator and washing machine replacement and installations, and other emergency repairs.
services.subject: Pipes, toilets, sinks, baths, showers, boilers, radiators, washing machines, and dishwashers.
services.works: Replacing and installation of boilers, taps, toilets, sinks, pipes, valves, toilets, showers, baths, dishwashers, and washing machines.
services.exclusions: Full central heating installation and specialist internal repairs for toilets, showers, baths, dishwashers, and washing machines are excluded.

services.name: Non-emergency plumbing
services.descr: Water leaks and burst pipes, blocked toilets, sinks, drains, low water pressure, tap, radiator, dishwasher and washing machine replacement and installations.
services.subject: Pipes, toilet, sinks, basins, sewage, boilers, radiators, shower, washing machines, dishwashers.
services.works: Replacement and installation of boilers, taps, valves, toilets, showers, baths, dishwashers, and washing machines.
services.exclusions: This is a non-emergency service with a response time of 24hrs. External drains and sewers and full boiler installation and repair services are excluded.

services.name: Drain and sewer repair
services.descr: Internal and external drains and sewers repairs including blockage removals, pipe replacements, etc.
services.subject: internal and external drains, sewers and pipes
services.works: Internal and external drain and sewer repair, including unblocking and cleaning and replacing drains, sewers and pipes.
services.exclusions: The cost of pipes and other materials is an additional charge, fixing water supply pipes not included.

name: Handyman
descr: Fixing small things around your house, including hanging paintings, assembling flatpacks, sealing baths and showers, etc.

services.name: Small home repairs
services.descr: Repairing and wide range of things in the home: furniture, appliances, objects, cracks, painting, decorating, etc.
services.subject: Home furniture, appliances, walls, and floors.
services.works: Installing mirrors, paintings, lights, replacing bulbs, easy fixing of windows, doors, and door handles
services.exclusions: No electric, gas, plumbing or construction works which require any special qualifications

services.name: Furniture assembly
services.descr: Building flat-packs, easy woodworking projects and anything related furniture assembly
services.subject: Home furniture
services.works: Assembling wardrobes, beds, sofas, tables and desks, cabinets, drawers, stools and chairs assembly, shelves. Also hanging artwork, doors, windows and other easy fixes around the home
services.exclusions: No house repairs are included

name: Computing
descr: Get expert help on any computer-related problems, from software and hardware to websites, wifi and networking issues.

services.works: Disk cleanup, installing and configuring apps, consultancy on personal computing and digital services. upgrading operating systems (Windows, Mac, etc.)

services.descr: Consultancy on internet network requirements for your home, analysis of current problems, internet speed improvement, and design, repair and installation of home networks.

services.exclusions: Website hosting is not included and all purchases required for creating the website (domains, CMS etc.) will be agreed and priced as additional costs. No dynamic content such as e-shop for instance.

name: Care
descr: Non-medical, professional carers for children, elderly and people with disabilities.

services.name: Shopping
services.descr: Can’t get out of the house? Get help buying food and everyday items. Have a service person arrive at your home, create a shopping list with your assistance and purchase the items from your nearest shop.
services.subject: Shopping
services.works: Food and everyday item shopping in the nearest location
services.exclusions: Shop must be no farther than 15 minutes walk from residence. Money required for shopping must be provided.

services.name: Elderly companion
services.descr: Get professional help with elderly friends and relatives. From casual conversation to accompanying them on hospital visits and other excursions.
services.subject: Companionship and assistance for elderly people
services.works: Walking together in the local neighbourhood, engaging conversation and companionship, and visiting public places (including hospital visits).
services.exclusions: The service does not include provision of a car, but a taxi may be used if the customer is happy to pay for it. Any extra expenses related to the service are not included.

services.name: Elderly care
services.descr: Any non-medical care services for elderly people requiring help with everyday tasks.
services.subject: Elderly people
services.works: Assisting with everyday tasks in the home, including: washing clothes and dishes, help bathing and using the bathroom, dressing, and cooking basic meals.
services.exclusions: No medical treatment. Assistant may refuse to do any other type of professional work including cleaning the house.. Assistant will no be obliged to assist outside the residence or pay for any additional expenses.

services.name: Private chef
services.descr: Cooking nutritional meals for you in your own home.
services.subject: All daily meals, including: breakfast, lunch, dinner, tea.
services.works: Basic meal preparation, from meal preparation to washing the dishes.
services.exclusions: Our cooks will not provide the groceries, these can be provided by the customer and agreed upon in advance and any other related expenses will not be in the price. No complex or length recipes will be accepted, cooks may refuse to follow customers’ recipes.

services.name: Socialising service
services.descr: Service person will commit to spend time and have fun together with the elderly.
services.subject: Socialising
services.works: Choosing socialising activities with the elderly, going out, making hand crafts, painting, reading books, discussing the most recent happenings.
services.exclusions: Any expenses co-related to the service are not included

services.name: Toddler care (1-2yrs)
services.descr: Get professional, complete child care for children aged 12-24 months, from feeding and changing nappies to playing and outside activities.
services.subject: Your child (aged 12-24 months)
services.works: Feeding, changing nappies, walking and excursions in the local area,, health monitoring, ensuring child safety during all activities, playing with toys and games, conversation and developing communication skills, and all usual babysitting activities.
services.exclusions: Any child requiring care must be healthy, with no known allergies, and a contact phone number is required in case of emergency. A list of care instructions and food must be provided by the customer, and each appointment will last no longer than 4 hours.

services.name: Toddler care (2-4yrs)
services.descr: Get professional, complete child care for children aged 24-48 months, from feeding and changing nappies to playing and outside activities.
services.subject: Your child (2-4yrs)
services.works: Feeding, changing nappies, walking and excursions in the local area, health monitoring, ensuring child safety during all activities, playing with toys and games, conversation and developing communication skills, supervised socializing with other children, and all usual babysitting activities.
services.exclusions: Any child requiring care must be healthy, with no known allergies, and a contact phone number is required in case of emergency. A list of care instructions and food must be provided by the customer, and each appointment will last no longer than 4 hours.

services.name: Primary school age child babysitting

services.subject: Primary school age child
services.works: Feeding, changing nappies, walking and excursions in the local area, health monitoring, ensuring child safety during all activities, playing with toys and games, conversation and developing communication skills, supervised socializing with other children, and all usual babysitting activities.
services.exclusions: Any child requiring care must be healthy, with no known allergies, and a contact phone number is required in case of emergency. A list of care instructions and food must be provided by the customer, and each appointment will last no longer than 4 hours.

name: Locksmith

services.name: Changing lock
services.descr: Master locksmith will come to your address and replace the lock in your door.
services.subject: Doors and locks
services.works: Removing original lock and replacing with new lock for any door at your home address.
services.exclusions: Locks and other required materials must be supplied by the customer and available for the agreed work date.

services.name: Key replication
services.descr: Master locksmith master collects your key, replicates it, and returns with the new key(s) to ensure it works.
services.subject: Keys
services.works: Covers the duplication of all types of normal home door keys
services.exclusions: Original keys must be supplied by the customer and available for the agreed work date

services.name: Door opening
services.descr: Master locksmith master will open your home’s door for you if the lock breaks or you lose your key.
services.subject: Door, key, lock
services.works: Picking home door locks, breaking locks, door opening at your home address.
services.exclusions: Customer ID required, and customer must be available for the agreed work date.

services.name: Ladies manicure
services.descr: Professional ladies nail care session in your home includes: manicure, skin softening procedures, etc.
services.subject: Nails on both hands
services.works: Cleaning, clipping, polishing and filing nails, and moisturising hands.
services.exclusions: No Shellac or CND products provided

services.name: Ladies signature manicure
services.descr: Professional ladies nail care session in your home from a high-class manicurist includes: manicure, polishing and varnishing with your choice of varnish, and skin softening procedures, etc.
services.subject: Nails on both hands
services.works: Cleaning, clipping, polishing and filing nails, applying your choice of nail varnish, and moisturising hands.
services.exclusions: No Shellac or CND products provided.

services.name: Ladies CND/Shellac manicure
services.descr: Long-lasting manicures with your choice of varnish, includes; nail cleaning and shaping, and hand skin treatments
services.subject: Nails on both hands
services.works: Manicure, cleaning, clipping, polishing and filing nails and applying your choice of CND/Shellac nail varnish, and moisturising hands
services.exclusions: exclusions

services.name: Ladies pedicure
services.descr: Professional ladies foot care session in your home includes: pedicure, nail cleaning, cutting, polishing and varnishing, and foot soaking, cleaning and skin softening procedures, etc.
services.subject: Nails on both feet
services.works: Cleaning, clipping and filing nails, moisturising feet, polishing nails, etc.
services.exclusions: No Shellac or CND products provided

services.name: Gents manicure
services.descr: Professional gents’ nail care session in your home. A manicure includes: manicure (nail clipping, shaping, cleaning and polishing), skin softening procedures, etc.
services.subject: Nails on both hands
services.works: Cleaning, clipping, filing and shaping nails, moisturising hands, polishing nails (transparent varnish may be used), etc.
services.exclusions: No Shellac or CND products provided

services.name: Gents pedicure
services.descr: Professional ladies foot care session in your home includes: pedicure, nail cleaning, cutting, polishing and varnishing, and foot soaking, cleaning and skin softening procedures, etc.
services.subject: Nails on both feet
services.works: Cleaning, clipping and filing nails, moisturising feet, polishing nails (transparent nail varnish may be used), etc.
services.exclusions: No Shellac or CND products provided
